#how to use guide
= How to use pdtsmarty =

 # Open the php explorer view,choose a php project which you want to add smarty support.
 # Right click on the php project,select the menu 'Smarty' -> 'Add Smarty Nature' 
 # Select from the main menu 'File' -> 'New' 
 # Choose to add a file (from the list or from the 'Other' option)
 # fill <yourfilename>.tpl in the 'file name' field of the wizard
 # You can start editng your file and use both pdt and smarty support.
